content.raw:
I'm currently at a loss with homebrew. I've tried manually `dlload`ing the main gazebo library in ruby, and that also fails with:

```
can't load /Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/build/lib/libignition-gazebo2.2.dylib
```

How about we get this PR in, and save the homebrew usage of `ign` for after the release?

@scpeters , I believe this PR includes the changes you made in your branch.
